answers.author: Katie Wilken
answers.text:
We have a survey which is available on our website: https://www.goodyearaz.gov/forms.aspx?FID=206
We have customers sign in at the front counter and then we send a monthly e-mail blast asking customers to fill out the survey with a link to the website. The results get dumped into an excel spreadsheet making it easy to review.

answers.author: Jennifer Chadwell
answers.text:
I know that we use a web service called Survey Monkey for many of our surveys.  Their website is www.surveymonkey.com and I believe that their fees are very reasonable.  For internal surveys, the surveys are simple emailed to staff through a link that is provided.  For external surveys links can be included on e-newsletters, websites and social media sites such as Facebook.  Good luck!
